title: Egg and vegetable curry
ingredients: ['6 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 medium - large onions, halved and sliced', '3 rounded tablespoons Madras curry paste (I used PataksÂ®)', '2 red peppers, cut into 2.5cm chunks', '250g new potatoes', '2 carrots, cut into 1cm chunks', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes, stalky bits and skin removed', '1 vegetable stock cube', '200ml water', '200g green beans or peas', '6 hard boiled eggs, peeled and halved', '2 tablespoons chopped coriander']
